title: Chapter 624 - A Solitary Island
body:
Chapter 624 - A Solitary Island

Ge Changling was Ge Qian’s master. Su Yi naturally had no reason to doubt him.

“Who took Wen Changtai and Qin Qing away? What was their cultivation?” asked Su Yi.

“Two Origin Palace demonic cultivators,” said Ge Changling.

Su Yi sank into thought.

They’d left yesterday morning. The two Origin Palace demonic cultivators were surely proficient at flight, but with their abilities, they’d still need about three days to reach the Sea of Chaotic Spirits.

Furthermore, he dared say with certainty that Chu Xiu had long since returned to the Sea of Chaotic Spirits.

Chu Xiu had once infiltrated the Immortals’ Sword House, and he had to know that Su Yi had already occupied the ruins.

When Chu Xiu failed to capture those closest to Su Yi, he had to have realized that Ning Sihua and the others had hidden in the ruins of the Immortals’ Sword House.

For Chu Xiu to have Su Yi’s former in-laws sent to the Sea of Chaotic Spirits likely implied that Chu Xiu had yet to make it into the ruins.

Su Yi found this reassuring.
